# Widen Auras (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 2]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 199

The range of your antipaladin or paladin auras doubles. For example, if youâ€™re a paladin, your aura of courage affects allies within 20 feet instead of within 10 feet.
